placesToVisit.description: An architectural masterpiece and one of the most recognizable buildings in the world.
Climb this iconic bridge for stunning panoramic views of the harbor and city.
One of the world's most famous beaches, perfect for surfing, swimming, or relaxing.
A modern piazza and cultural hub, home to museums, galleries, and restaurants.
A historic landmark and bustling market with a huge variety of fresh produce and goods.
A beautiful and peaceful oasis in the heart of the city, perfect for a relaxing stroll.
The world's first and largest koala sanctuary, where you can hold a koala and feed kangaroos.
A vibrant riverside park with a man-made beach, restaurants, and entertainment.
An iconic bridge offering adventure climbs and stunning views of the city.
One of the world's largest inner-city parks, with stunning views and unique flora.
A popular and picturesque beach, perfect for swimming, surfing, and watching the sunset.
A former maximum-security prison that offers fascinating and spooky tours.
A vibrant market with a huge variety of fresh produce, gourmet food, and local products.
A popular seaside destination with a beautiful beach, shops, and restaurants.
One of Australia's most famous wine regions, with world-class wineries and stunning scenery.
